data.message: Run reliability cure tests (cancel signal + timeout isolation): Both passed: (1) Reembed timeout correctly triggered cancel signal (2) Fast tools (heartbeat 0.02ms, semantic search) worked instantly after heavy timeout with 3/4 concurrency available. Executor split confirmed working.
